featureSchema.name: Task Creation
featureSchema.description: Allows users to create new tasks with an option to add detailed descriptions. This is the fundamental building block of the Todo App.
featureSchema.userStory: As a user, I want to create tasks easily so that I can keep track of my activities and manage my schedule.
featureSchema.acceptanceCriteria: Users must be able to add a task by providing a title and an optional description. The task should be saved persistently and visible in the task list.
featureSchema.additional: Include validations for empty input and provide a user-friendly error message if necessary.
featureSchema.prompt: Develop a UI component that allows users to enter a task title and description. Ensure that the component validates input and integrates with the backend to store new tasks.
featureSchema.notes: Focus on a simple and intuitive form interface; consider both mobile and desktop experiences.
